Abbreviations.M132: cortical parcellation defined by Markov et al. 2012, https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhs270
Abbreviations.PAX: the rhesus monkey brain atlas by Paxinos et al. 2000
Abbreviations.PAXs: subcortical part of the rhesus monkey brain atlas by Paxinos et al. 2000
Abbreviations.NMT: digital brain atlas by Reveley et al. 2017, https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhw248
Abbreviations.NMTs: subcortical part of the digital template atlas by Reveley et al. 2017, https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhw248
Abbreviations.D99: digital brain atlas by Saleem et al. 2021, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118759
Abbreviations.D99s: subcortical part of the digital brain atlas by Saleem et al. 2021, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118759
Abbreviations.SARM: subcortical atlas by Hartig et al. 2021, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.117996
